name: The Last Gecko
description:
A game still in development. In The Last Gecko, you must eliminate the wild creatures that try to take away your peace. Try to reach higher and higher scores in this super fun arcade shooter!

The artwork for the game is still placeholder. In the meantime, enjoy playing with Pikachu!

And please don't shoot the doggy! 🐶

ControlsWASD  to move

Mouse to aim
• Left Button: Shoot
• Right Button: Build Barricade (Consumes  wood)

...

Delete Key: Erase saved highscore.
